data.text: @newbatsflu2019 Thank you. It certainly shows that most deaths occur in the older age group, who tend to have much higher vaccination rates. What it doesn’t show is other underlying health factors etc  Could you send the link in the section which refers to effectiveness of vaccines? Thanks

@CaroCobbo Here's the latest. All lives matter regardless of age. So calculate the death rate here first.

The data is clear that the death rate is higher in the vaccinated. https://t.co/eeEHZmUKzt

@newbatsflu2019 Please provide a link to this report important to know if age considered. July to December 2021 age-adjusted risk COVID-19 death was 93.4% lower for people who had received a third dose, or booster, at least 21 days ago compared with unvaccinated people. https://t.co/jojfT1rcCf
@newbatsflu2019 And are you Including children in those statistics?
@newbatsflu2019 And then do the break-down by age, please.

@AnneJackson18 Can't you see that the death rate of the vaccinated is higher than the vaccination %? 

It's obvious that death % is higher in the vaccinated.
@newbatsflu2019 When a very high  % of people are vaccinated that is inevitable. Obviously

@Jenifer46277051 @AlexStillMe @newbatsflu2019 Wait till Alex is dying a long slow horrible death .. they've gone blind .. incontinent.. then their kids go the same way and then we can say .. "ah well they might have died anyway" ..
@AlexStillMe @newbatsflu2019 Is it lucrative work being an apologist for Pfizer?🤣

Reported cardiac failure and other cardiovascular adverse events from Pfizer vaccine. 

1403 reported cases within just 3 months. Magnitude of underreporting is unknown. #COVID19 https://t.co/W9R8jje2d5
